samples.description: Contains .dll's of required libraries. System.Buffers, System.Memory, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe (mostly for accessing ReadOnlySpan<>)
Contains custom base types for MonoBehaviour and ScriptableObject, and editor types. Requiring you to override the methods you want to use while respecting base type's functionality.
This feature creates subtypes of StaticObject automatically without scraping assemblies in builds.
